tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    solar_intensity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Researcher (
    researcher_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    affiliation VARCHAR(100)
);
CREATE TABLE SolarData (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id UUID REFERENCES Researcher(researcher_id),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    weather_condition VARCHAR(50),
    solar_energy_generation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
	data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	location_id UUID,
	date DATE,
	solar_radiation INT,
	temperature FLOAT,
	precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SolarEnergy (
	solar_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	location_id UUID,
	date DATE,
	solar_generation FLOAT,
	efficiency FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE WeatherData ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(100), temperature FLOAT, humidity FLOAT, wind_speed FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE SolarEnergyData ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(100), solar_panel_id INT, energy_generated FLOAT, time_of_generation TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE Researchers ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), email VARCHAR(100), institution VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE DataQueries ( query_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_id INT, query_text VARCHAR(255), query_timestamp TIMESTAMP );
